root.name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Onikakushi-hen
root.description: PlotKeiichi Maebara, has just moved to the village called Hinamizawa, where he quickly becomes friends with Rena, Rika, Mion and Satoko. With whom, he participates in many after school activities with. Everything is going well for Keiichi, until the Watanagashi Festival, which is an annual festivel that celebrates the local god Oyashiro, someone dies. Keiichi also learns that, every year, for the past 4 years, one person has died, and another has dissapeared on the day of the festival. Throughout the next year, his friends start acting weird, and Keiichi attempts to unravel this plot. In this Arc, Rena and Mion are the implied villains. ReceptionHigurashi no Naku Koro ni Onikakushi hen sold over 100,000 copies, making it the Highest selling Doujin-Soft game in the last 2 years. Higurashi no Naku Koro ni onkikakushi hen has also been adapted into a Manga, Anime and Live Action Movie. It has sold over 500,000 copies since 2008.
